title: Insert Interval
description:
Given a set of non-overlapping intervals sorted by start time, insert a new interval and merge any overlapping intervals.

Return the modified list of intervals.

Example:
  Input: intervals = [[1,3],[6,9]], newInterval = [2,5]
  Output: [[1,5],[6,9]]
test_code:
require_relative './solution'
require 'minitest/autorun'

class TestSolution < Minitest::Test
  def test_basic
    assert_equal [[1, 5], [6, 9]], insert([[1, 3], [6, 9]], [2, 5])
  end

  def test_multiple_merge
    assert_equal [[1, 2], [3, 10], [12, 16]], insert([[1, 2], [3, 5], [6, 7], [8, 10], [12, 16]], [4, 8])
  end

  def test_no_overlap
    assert_equal [[1, 5], [6, 8]], insert([[1, 5]], [6, 8])
  end
end
